scripts.start:other: yarn install && $TERMINAL ng serve --port 4200 --configuration=development & $TERMINAL docker-compose up
scripts.start: yarn install && start cmd /k "ng serve --port 4200 --configuration=development" & start cmd /k "docker-compose up"
scripts.api:superuser: yarn docker:exec api python manage.py createsuperuser
scripts.api:startapp: yarn docker:exec api python manage.py startapp
scripts.api:makemigrations: yarn docker:exec api python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.api:migrate: yarn docker:exec api python manage.py migrate
scripts.api:populateproducts: yarn docker:exec api python manage.py populateproducts
scripts.api:populateproductsellers: yarn docker:exec api python manage.py populateproductsellers
scripts.api:populatesellers: yarn docker:exec api python manage.py populatesellers
scripts.api:depopulatesellers: yarn docker:exec api python manage.py depopulatesellers
scripts.api:depopulateproducts: yarn docker:exec api python manage.py depopulateproducts
scripts.api:depopulateproductsellers: yarn docker:exec api python manage.py depopulateproductsellers
scripts.api:mockdata: yarn api:populateproducts&& yarn api:populatesellers && yarn api:populateproductsellers
scripts.api:deletemockdata: yarn api:depopulateproducts && yarn api:depopulatesellers && yarn api:depopulateproductsellers
scripts.precypress:run: docker-compose exec -T api python manage.py populateproducts && docker-compose exec -T api python manage.py populatesellers && docker-compose exec -T api python manage.py populateproductsellers
